Installation Instructions :


1. Install thes apk file.

2. Extract and copy the SD Data files in following directory :

storage/extSdCard/Merriam-Webster/

If there is no folder named "Merriam-Webster" create one.


Launch the app and follow the on screen instructions for manual data transfer


Note : Don't follow the download option on screen...
